image_parameters.name: timestamp
image_parameters.documentation: The time that the image was acquired specified as a datenum (if global clock) or in seconds (if local clock).

image_parameters.name: clocktype
image_parameters.documentation: The clock type of the timestamp. Use a global clock if available.

image_parameters.name: width
image_parameters.documentation: The width of the image in pixels.

image_parameters.name: height
image_parameters.documentation: The height of the image in pixels.

image_parameters.name: bitdepth
image_parameters.documentation: The number of bits per pixel (e.g 8, 16).

image_parameters.name: scale
image_parameters.documentation: The spatial scale of the image in pixels per scale_unit.

image_parameters.name: scale_unit
image_parameters.documentation: The units of the image scale such as pixels per 'mm' or pixels per 'inch'.
